SELECT COUNT(*) AS totcnt FROM (SELECT A.USER_ID, A.USER_NM, A.GROUP_ID, A.MBER_TY_CODE, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM012' AND CODE = A.MBER_TY_CODE AND USE_AT = 'Y') AS MBER_TY_NM, B.AUTHOR_CODE, (CASE WHEN B.SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) AS REG_YN, ESNTL_ID, (SELECT ORGNZT_NM FROM LETTNORGNZTINFO WHERE ORGNZT_ID = A.ORGNZT_ID) AS orgnztId, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE = A.GRADE) as grade FROM (SELECT EMPLYR_ID USER_ID, USER_NM USER_NM, GROUP_ID, 'USR03' MBER_TY_CODE, ESNTL_ID, ORGNZT_ID, GRADE FROM LETTNEMPLYRINFO ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS B ON A.ESNTL_ID = B.SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTNAUTHORINFO D ON D.AUTHOR_CODE = B.AUTHOR_CODE WHERE A.USER_ID != 'empty@iteyes.co.kr' AND B.AUTHOR_CODE != 'ROLE_HIGH_ADMIN' AND USER_ID != 'admin'
AND (A.USER_ID LIKE '%' #{searchKeyword} '%' OR A.USER_NM LIKE '%' #{searchKeyword} '%')
AND D.AUTHOR_CODE = #{searchAuthor} ) A
